ctx: intros Q p q H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H3 : CombLinear Q q x, y : list (Term A n) H : eqP A eqA n p q H0 : x = p H4 : y = q Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2271 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q p".

ctx: intros Q p q H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.exn: The reference a was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros Q p q H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H3 : CombLinear Q q x, y, z : list (Term A n) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p y H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q y q H4 : x = p H5 : z = q Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM p" with "CombLinear Q p".

ctx: intros Q p q H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H2 : canonical A0 eqA ltM p H3 : CombLinear Q q x, y, z : list (Term A n) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p y H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q y q H4 : x = p H5 : z = q Unable to unify "CombLinear Q q" with "CombLinear Q p".

original: intros Q p q H1 H2 H3. inversion H1. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (a:=a) (q:=q) (s:=s). + auto. + auto. + apply H2. + auto. + apply H3.
